title: New: Matilda – The Lord
body: Following up the quite simply beautiful _[Blood](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17137-new-matilda-blood/)_, **Matilda** wows yet again with this movingly minimal new track, _The Lord_. Like an even more sombre version of everyones favourite new songstress **Eddi Front**; swirling piano sections and perfectly imperfect vocals form the background of the track. End your boxing day in style, check out _The Lord_ below.
